title: WTB: Columbus Senators T206 Trial Run
author: shernan30

posts.post_title: WTB: Columbus Senators T206 Trial Run
posts.post_content:
I own NO T206 cards and only 1 T card for that matter, but want to put a few in my collection. I'm pondering a Columbus Senators T206 set since I live in Columbus and am Ohio born and raised. I'm not looking for high grade, but cards will nice eye appeal. This is an opportunity for the many T206 collectors to turn me.

Here are the players I'm looking for:
Josh Clark
Bill Clymer
Bunk Congalton
Otto Kruger
Ossee Schreck

Limited budget since this is just a trial run. PM or email with any good deals.

Steven

I dont think they were called the Senators.  The foxes I think.  


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
The Columbus Foxes were from Columbus, Georgia, I'm looking for the Columbus, Ohio team. It gets very confusing because most of the cards just say Columbus and don't list the state or team name.
